faqs.answer: Udyog Vihar is primarily designated as an industrial and commercial zone segmented into various phases. faqs.question: What documentation is crucial before finalizing a commercial plot purchase
faqs.answer: Crucial documentation includes a clear title deed certified copies of the plot allocation letter from the relevant authority municipal tax receipts non-encumbrance certificates and verification of the FSI Floor Space Index allowance for commercial construction. We ensure all our listed plots have impeccable paperwork and are free from legal disputes facilitating a seamless transfer of ownership.

faqs.answer: Yes foreign nationals and Foreign Institutional Investors FIIs are generally permitted to invest in commercial property in India including plots in Udyog Vihar subject to compliance with the Foreign Exchange Management Act FEMA regulations.
